participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Friendly and curious, enjoys exploring new experiences.
participant_1.background: I like to go out to eat. I like listening to other rap music too. A hobby of mine is the drums. One of my favorite artists is drake. I also enjoy cooking.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and devoted, with a strong sense of duty and pride.
participant_2.background: I have a wife and two kids back in the states. I am an army ranger. I secretly love my long deployments, because it gets me away from conventional life. I would be honored to give my life for my country.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
Oh wow, that's really cool! What's it like being in the military?
It's challenging but rewarding. I get to do things that most people can't even dream of.
Like jumping out of planes, shooting guns, and blowing things up.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It is! But it's also dangerous. I've been in a lot of dangerous situations, but I'm always willing to do whatever it takes to protect my country.
Thank you. I'm proud to be an Army Ranger.
What are your plans for after you retire from the military?
I'm not sure yet. I might go back to school or start a business. I'm just going to take it one day at a time.
That sounds like a good plan.
I'm sure you'll do great whatever you decide to do.
